item.title: Increase Ant Hibernate Junit tests Performance by 80%
item.description: If donÂ´t want to read everything, just set forkingmode=“once” to have huge improvement in your tests processing time. :) Now the details… I have several, around 100 junit tests in Robolucha project, most of then use Hibernate and are run by an ant script. When you start Java Virtual machine Hibernate prepares itself to connect to the database by checking the necessary tables and preparing all the internals needed to work, but this process takes some time, some seconds to say the true.
